If people tell you that you need to make up your mind,...
I'd like to go to France to see the Eiffel Tower...
Or maybe Spain for the amazing beaches.
OK, OK, make up your mind!
"Make up your mind" is a way of saying make a decision or pick something.
It might mean making a choice from two or more things.
Some people have trouble making a decision...
...so others might tell them, "Make up your mind and pick one."
